actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide for foreign exchange adjustments in regular military compensation available to personnel stationed overseas.

summary.text: Stipulates that regular military compensation for personnel stationed overseas shall be periodically adjusted upward to reflect any changes since January 1, 1977, in the rate of exchange between the dollar and the official currency of the country in which such personnel are stationed.

titles.title: A bill to provide for foreign exchange adjustments in regular military compensation available to personnel stationed overseas.
